name: VR Slime Shooter
description:
VR experience created for the Oculus Quest 2. Experience a quiet valley when slime monsters arrive to ruin your fun. Use the wand or sword to defeat the enemies and explore the beautiful landscape.

To use:
1. Download the APK 

2. Run in Oculus Runtime

This is a Demo and a Project created for a CS class at my University. Uploading it just for fun, please be nice but I would love feedback! New to Game Design and VR, I have only been working in the medium for 5 months.
